Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dastardly \Das"tard*ly\, a. Meanly timid; cowardly; base; as, a dastardly outrage. [1913 Webster]
dastardly adj : treacherously cowardly; "the unprovoked and dastardly attack by Japan on...December 7th"- F.D. Roosevelt [syn: {dastard(a)}]
